sections.name: Lomok
sections.text: This creature did not include a description.

traits.name: Unique
traits.text: A rules element with this trait is one-of-a-kind. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to creatures with this trait is increased by 10.

traits.name: Lawful
traits.text: Lawful effects often manipulate energy from law-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to chaotic divine servants or divine servants of chaotic deities. A creature with this trait is lawful in alignment.

traits.name: Good
traits.text: Good effects often manipulate energy from good-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to evil divine servants or divine servants of evil deities. A creature with this trait is good in alignment.

traits.name: Aasimar
traits.text: A creature with this trait has the aasimar versatile heritage. Aasimars are planar scions descended from celestial beings. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by aasimars.

traits.name: Human
traits.text: A creature with this trait is a member of the human ancestry. Humans are a diverse array of people known for their adaptability. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by humans.

traits.name: Humanoid
traits.text: Humanoid creatures reason and act much like humans. They typically stand upright and have two arms and two legs.

modifiers.name: +1 status to all saves vs. disease

automatic_abilities.name: Aura of Courage
automatic_abilities.text: 15 feet. Whenever Lomok becomes frightened, reduce the condition value by 1 (minimum 0). At the end of his turn, when he would reduce his frightened condition value by 1, also reduce the value by 1 for all allies in his aura.

automatic_abilities.name: Powerful Will
automatic_abilities.text: When Lomok rolls a success on a Will save, he gets a critical success instead.

automatic_abilities.name: Retributive Strike
automatic_abilities.trigger: An enemy damages one of Lomok's allies, and both combatants are within 15 feet of him
automatic_abilities.effect: Lomok shields his ally and calls for retribution upon the attacker. The ally reduces the triggering damage by 13. Lomok and any allies within reach of the triggering enemy can make melee Strikes against it.

automatic_abilities.name: Spurred by Death
automatic_abilities.trigger: An ally within 30 feet reduces a creature to 0 HP

traits.name: Versatile
traits.text: A versatile weapon can be used to deal a different type of damage than that listed in the Damage entry. This trait indicates the alternate damage type. For instance, a piercing weapon that is versatile S can be used to deal piercing or slashing damage. You choose the damage type each time you make an attack.

traits.name: Thrown
traits.text: You can throw this weapon as a ranged attack, and it is a ranged weapon when thrown. A thrown weapon adds your Strength modifier to damage just like a melee weapon does. When this trait appears on a melee weapon, it also includes the range increment. Ranged weapons with this trait use the range increment specified in the weapon’s Range entry.

ability.name: Oath of the Burning Mammoths
ability.text: Lomok's melee Strikes deal an additional 1d10 persistent fire damage. If he critically hits a creature with a melee Strike, the creature is flat-footed for as long as it takes persistent fire damage.
